mapper.select: /*getTodoList*/ SELECT todoNo , todoTitle , todoContent , DATE_FORMAT(todoDay, '%Y-%m-%d') AS todoDay , DATE_FORMAT(todoTime, '%H:%i:%s') AS todoTime , todoState FROM tododetail WHERE todoState = 'TR' GROUP BY todoNo ORDER BY todoDay ASC , todoTime IS NULL ASC , todoTime ASC

/*getTodoDetail*/ SELECT todoNo , todoTitle , todoContent , DATE_FORMAT(todoDay, '%Y-%m-%d') AS todoDay , DATE_FORMAT(todoTime, '%H:%i:%s') AS todoTime , todoState FROM tododetail WHERE todoNo = #{todoNo}
